body:
I can't really seem to decide any heat related names for the 1.8 Update.

I would like to see some nicknames that you guys come up with. 

Thanks!
body_tagged:
I can't really seem to decide any heat related names for the 1.8 Update.

I would like to see some nicknames that you guys come up with. 

Thanks!
title: Heat Related Names

replies.body:
Try to find something in Latin, related to the science of how heat works, don't use underscores, numbers, X's or multiple words, then you've hit the jackpot.

Scolded is an awersome username, taken though.
